speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm contacting you regarding your outstanding balance with First National Bank. Before we proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your information. You currently have a balance of $750. How would you like to proceed with your payment today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $250 right now over the phone.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I can help you with that. Can I have your payment details, please?

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, I’ll provide my credit card number.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you. Please provide the card number when you're ready.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Your payment has been successfully processed.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
